Xaml:
<Activity mc:Ignorable="sap sap2010 sads" x:Class="Robot_5_-_Invoice_Data_Extraction" mva:VisualBasic.Settings="{x:Null}" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Robot_5_-_Invoice_Data_Extraction_1"
 xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netfx/2009/xaml/activities"

 xmlns:sd="clr-namespace:System.Data;assembly=System.Data"

  <TextExpression.NamespacesForImplementation>

    </sco:Collection>
  </TextExpression.NamespacesForImplementation>
  <TextExpression.ReferencesForImplementation>
    <sco:Collection x:TypeArguments="AssemblyReference">
      <AssemblyReference>mscorlib</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Xml</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>OpenRPA</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>OpenRPA.Interfaces</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Data</AssemblyReference>

      <AssemblyReference>System.Data.DataSetExtensions</AssemblyReference>

      <AssemblyReference>System.ServiceModel</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Runtime.WindowsRuntime</AssemblyReference>

      <AssemblyReference>Microsoft.Bcl.HashCode</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.ValueTuple</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.ComponentModel.Composition</AssemblyReference>
      <AssemblyReference>System.Net.WebSockets.Client.Managed</AssemblyReference>
    </sco:Collection>
  </TextExpression.ReferencesForImplementation>
  <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_1">
    <Sequence.Variables>
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="s:String[]" Name="arrInvoicesFullPath" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Default="C:\Users\marce\Desktop\Invoices\" Name="strInvoicesFolderFullPath" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="strInvoiceText" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="sd:DataTable" Name="dt_invoices" />
      <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Default="%USERPROFILE%\Desktop\Invoices\Invoices.xlsx" Name="strExcelFilePath" />
    </Sequence.Variables>
    <ou:CreateDataTable ColumnNames="[{"Invoice Number", "Invoice Date", "Invoice Grand Total"}]" DataTable="[dt_invoices]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="CreateDataTable_1" />
    <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_1">
      <Assign.To>
        <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="s:String[]">[arrInvoicesFullPath]</OutArgument>
      </Assign.To>
      <Assign.Value>
        <InArgument x:TypeArguments="s:String[]">[Directory.GetFiles(strInvoicesFolderFullPath)]</InArgument>
      </Assign.Value>
    </Assign>
    <oa:ForEachOf x:TypeArguments="x:String" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ForEachOf`1_1" Values="[arrInvoicesFullPath]">
      <oa:ForEachOf.Variables>
        <sco:Collection x:TypeArguments="Variable" />
      </oa:ForEachOf.Variables>
      <ActivityAction x:TypeArguments="x:String">
        <ActivityAction.Argument>
          <DelegateInArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="Invoice" />
        </ActivityAction.Argument>
        <Sequence sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Sequence_2">
          <Sequence.Variables>
            <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="strInvoiceNumber" />
            <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="strInvoiceDate" />
            <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="strInvoiceGrandTotal" />
          </Sequence.Variables>
          <ou:ReadPDF Password="{x:Null}" Result="{x:Null}" AllText="[strInvoiceText]" Filename="[Invoice]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="ReadPDF_1" />
          <WriteLine sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="WriteLine_2" Text="[strInvoiceText]" />
          <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_2">
            <Assign.To>
              <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[strInvoiceNumber]</OutArgument>
            </Assign.To>
            <Assign.Value>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(strInvoiceText, "(#\d+[\s]?\d+)").Value]</InArgument>
            </Assign.Value>
          </Assign>
          <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_3">
            <Assign.To>
              <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[strInvoiceDate]</OutArgument>
            </Assign.To>
            <Assign.Value>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(strInvoiceText, "(?<=Invoice Date:\s)(\d{2}[\s]?/\d{2}/\d{4})").Value]</InArgument>
            </Assign.Value>
          </Assign>
          <Assign sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="Assign_4">
            <Assign.To>
              <OutArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[strInvoiceGrandTotal]</OutArgument>
            </Assign.To>
            <Assign.Value>
              <InArgument x:TypeArguments="x:String">[System.Text.RegularExpressions.Regex.Match(strInvoiceText, "(?<=Grand Total\s+)[$](\d+.\d{2})").Value]</InArgument>
            </Assign.Value>
          </Assign>
          <ou:AddDataRow DataTable="[dt_invoices]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="AddDataRow_1" RowData="[{strInvoiceNumber, strInvoiceDate, strInvoiceGrandTotal}]" />
        </Sequence>
      </ActivityAction>
    </oa:ForEachOf>
    <ou:WriteExcel DataSet="{x:Null}" DataTable="[dt_invoices]" Filename="[strExcelFilePath]" sap2010:WorkflowViewState.IdRef="WriteExcel_1" Theme="None" includeHeader="True" />
    <sads:DebugSymbol.Symbol>dw1DOlxFbXB0eS54YW1sAA==</sads:DebugSymbol.Symbol>
  </Sequence>
  <sap2010:WorkflowViewState.ViewStateManager>
    <sap2010:ViewStateManager>
      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="CreateDataTable_1" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="434.4,102.4" />

      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="ForEachOf`1_1" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="434.4,839.2">

      <sap2010:ViewStateData Id="WriteExcel_1" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="434.4,69.6" />
